Acceptance Criteria: Users can login with secure credentials and access appropriate resources based on role
Notes: Integration with existing identity provider required

Acceptance Criteria: System can import data from CSV/Excel and export reports in multiple formats
Users can view live data updates and generate custom reports
System maintains 99.9% availability during business hours
All user interactions complete within 2 seconds
Notes: Load testing required for 1000 concurrent users

Requirement Description: Data encryption at rest and in transit
Acceptance Criteria: All sensitive data encrypted using industry standards
Bidirectional data sync with customer CRM platform
Notes: API rate limits and error handling required

Acceptance Criteria: Users authenticate through existing SSO provider
System handles personal data according to GDPR requirements
Notes: Data retention and deletion policies required

Acceptance Criteria: Daily automated backups with 4-hour recovery time
Interface available in English, Spanish, and French
Native mobile apps for iOS and Android platforms
Notes: Responsive web app may be sufficient initially

Acceptance Criteria: CPU: 8 cores, RAM: 32GB, Storage: 1TB SSD
Dedicated internet connection with 100Mbps bandwidth minimum
High-performance storage with IOPS > 10,000 and 5TB capacity
Scalable compute resources supporting auto-scaling policies
Support for Windows Server 2019+, Ubuntu 20.04+, RHEL 8+
Specific versions of runtime environments and libraries
CI/CD pipeline tools, monitoring, and management software
Full administrative access to target systems and platforms
Programmatic access to all required APIs and services
Notes: API rate limits and quota considerations

Acceptance Criteria: Required network ports and firewall configurations
Appropriate security clearances for sensitive environments
Notes: Allow sufficient time for clearance processing

Acceptance Criteria: Subject matter expertise in relevant technologies and platforms
Notes: Consider training and knowledge transfer needs

Acceptance Criteria: Industry-standard certifications for key technologies
Minimum years of experience with similar implementations
Specific training courses and learning paths
Notes: Budget for external training if needed

Acceptance Criteria: Understanding of business processes and industry requirements
Knowledge of existing processes and integration points
Understanding of key stakeholders and organizational structure
Knowledge of applicable compliance frameworks and regulations
